first_para: Sir Keir Starmer, KCB, QC (born 2 September 1962) is a British barrister who was the Director of Public Prosecutions (DPP) and the Head of the Crown Prosecution Service (CPS) from 2008 to 2013. He previously prosecuted numerous cases for the CPS during his career, specialising as a defence lawyer specializing in human rights law.

full.extract:
Sir Keir Starmer, KCB, QC (born 2 September 1962) is a British barrister who was the Director of Public Prosecutions (DPP) and the Head of the Crown Prosecution Service (CPS) from 2008 to 2013. He previously prosecuted numerous cases for the CPS during his career, specialising as a defence lawyer specializing in human rights law.
^ Nina Goswami: "Keir Starmer QC appointed DPP" (25 July 2008), The Lawyer
^ Frances Gibb: "Human rights lawyer Keir Starmer named as new prosecution service chief" (26 July 2008), Times online
full.title: Keir Starmer
